In the last 18 years, the Timberwolves' own first-round pick has landed:

Top half of lottery: 10 times
Nos. 21-30: 0 times

It's going to be a new era in Minnesota -- or extremely painful.
Tim Connelly acting like he can just get another job later. Not sure what would give him that idea. https://t.co/AmeWHM3P0m
"The price for Gobert might be too high."

I love the Timberwolves getting Rudy Gobert. Karl-Anthony Towns has proven he's an inadequate defensive anchor. The price for Gobert might be too high. Towns-Gobert might not fit. But Gobert gives Minnesota a chance of having a defense capable of holding up into the playoffs.
